item.description:
Dear Westborough Spirituality Meetup members,

How are you? I wish this email find you health and happiness.

We had so many snow storms this year; on the other hand the spring is not too far. Spring is always a good time to cleanse. No matter is physical or spiritual.

Last month, we discussed the different function of each side of brain from Dr. Jill Taylor's sharing.  One is more self center and the other is more focus on bigger self (oneness). Which one do I chose? Why? Loss the balance of these two, it will either become selfish or the other way around. Out of balance is not what we want in life.

It seems the weather is getting warmer soon. From the outside of environmental energy is cleansing the bad part and transforming into better self. We all can learn from nature, so we are going to continue the topic from last month, how can we become the better self and bring the peace to the world. Understand we are one and peace is right here right now.

If you would like to meet more friends with the same interest about seeking a spiritual life, please come and share your thoughts and experiences about how to practice spirituality in daily life.

Enjoy the day and let’s create positive energy to the whole world. Hope sees you all in our meetup.
item.how_to_find_us: It will be the 2nd building on your right hand side when you drive into condos.You can park any place with sign for guest/ visitor. call me if you can not find it 6172237166
item.name: Westborough Spiritual February Meetup
